events.message: The applicant submitted a request for a personal loan to cover upcoming medical expenses and consolidate existing debts.
Loan team categorised the application under personal loans due to the purpose including medical costs and debt consolidation.
An experienced loan officer specializing in personal loans was assigned to manage this case and assist the applicant.
The loan officer conducted an initial review focusing on applicant's income, credit history, and stated use of funds.
Requested detailed medical bills, proof of income, and outstanding debt statements to verify the loan purpose and repayment ability.
The applicant promptly submitted all requested documents including medical invoices, pay slips, and credit statements.
Credit bureau check was completed showing a fair credit score and no recent defaults or delinquencies for the applicant.
The risk assessment team evaluated the documents and credit report confirming moderate risk but viable repayment capacity.
An offer for loan amount with competitive interest rate and flexible repayment plan was presented to the applicant.
Applicant responded positively to the offer and requested clarification on some repayment terms before final acceptance.
The application was escalated to the senior credit committee for approval due to the loan amount exceeding standard limits.
Senior credit committee approved the personal loan after reviewing all documents and risk factors, granting requested terms.
The approved loan amount was transferred to the applicant’s bank account successfully and confirmation was sent.
Follow-up communication confirmed the applicant’s satisfaction with the loan terms and addressed any initial queries.
The loan application process was formally closed after all disbursements and post-approval checks were completed.
